name: The tower of doggel
description:
Game is simple, simply click to drop the block and try not to have the tower fall or crush the dogs. What's your best score?

The year is 0 PL (Past leaving), the humans have been gone for a total of 3 hours, the dogs have lost hope of them returning. Prayers to the dog god have come back unanswered, so they must build a tower to the heavens to reach it. (They have few resources and no opposable thumbs so it probably won't be stable.)

This was a project for school where we were presented a challenge to create a small game with only 1 sprite and 1 sound asset and only being able to use those.
